shortdesc.ph: Sets the user role in a live broadcast.

section.p: You can call this method either before or after joining the channel to set the user role as audience or host.

If you call this method to switch user roles after joining the channel, after the call is successful, the callback will be triggered locally; the remote side will trigger or (USER_OFFLINE_BECOME_AUDIENCE) callback.
section.note: This method only takes effect when the channel profile is live interactive streaming (when the profile parameter in set as ).
